title: Find a match
description: When you click on the Start button, a 6x6 field opens, on which 18 pairs of pictures are randomly arranged. After 3 seconds, the cards are closed and the timer starts counting. Task: to find a pair of pictures by clicking alternately (1 click opens the card, 2 clicks the second, if they match, they disappear from the screen, if not, they flip again after 0.5 seconds
